title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form S-2 - Warrant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form S-2 - Warrant

State Regulations
FORM S-2
WARRANT
STATE OF NEW YORK
SUPREME COURT COUNTY COURT
PART: ________ COUNTY: ____________
________
IN THE MATTER
of
A Warrant Pursuant to
C PL 330.20 in Relation to
________
Defendant
________
IN THE NAME OF THE PEOPLE OF THE
STATE OF NEW YORK
To the following peace officer: ________
________
An application having been filed with this
court by the District Attorney the Commissioner of Mental Health, pursuant to
the provisions of subdivision 14 of C PL 330.20, for a recommitment order
committing the above-named defendant to the custody of the Commissioner of

Mental Health for confinement in a secure facility for care and treatment for
six months from the date of the order, And, the above-named defendant having been
ordered to appear before this court for a hearing to determine whether he has a
dangerous mental disorder, And, the above-named defendant having failed
to appear in court as directed, NOW THEREFORE, You are hereby commanded to take the
above-named defendant into custody and bring him forthwith before this
court. Dated: ________
____________
Justice of the Supreme Court

Judge of the County Court

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. II, Forms (cf. Part 110), form
S-2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
